entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then clearing. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 this morning then steady. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
